about_the_game:
Dive into the heart of chaos in Cat Survivors, a relentless bullet hell experience infused with captivating roguelite elements. Brace yourself for the onslaught of endless waves of demons, each more menacing than the last. Your mission: survive, evolve, conquer.

Embark on a journey where each playthrough is a unique challenge. Battle against not only the relentless demons but also face unexpected and thrilling random events that will test your strategic prowess. Adapt to the ever-changing landscape as you upgrade your character and unlock the secrets to mastering the art of survival.



Cat Survivors offers a dynamic and strategic gameplay experience, allowing you to create powerful and diverse builds. Choose from an array of upgrades, each with its own skill tree, to tailor your character's abilities to your playstyle. Unleash the elemental fury with lightning strikes that pierce through hordes of enemies, or harness the chilling power of ice shards to freeze your foes in their tracks.



But that's not all – the arsenal at your disposal includes explosive abilities that turn the battlefield into a spectacle of destruction, razor-sharp swords for close-quarters combat, and mighty axes to cleave through demonic adversaries. Craft your unique combat style by combining these skills, paving the way for countless strategic possibilities.

In Cat Survivors, the challenge is not only in surviving the demonic onslaught but in mastering the intricate dance of elements and weapons. Can you rise above the chaos and emerge as the ultimate survivor? The realms of devil-infested mayhem await – assemble your arsenal, embrace the storm, and let the battle for survival begin!

name: Cat Survivors

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11, DX12 capable
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit

short_description: This bullet hell roguelite pits you against waves of ferocious demons, where strategic upgrades and dynamic builds are your keys to survival. Can you outlast the demonic onslaught and emerge as the ultimate Cat Survivor?
